item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, September 27, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:

2. End of an era: Landsat 7 mission takes final images (199 points | 34 comments)
3. Legalizing Sports Gambling Was a Mistake (318 points | 363 comments)

7. A pilot project in universal algebra to explore new ways to collaborate (141 points | 15 comments)
8. Vanilla OS 2: an immutable distribution to run all software (83 points | 26 comments)
9. Imbue (YC S17) Is Hiring a Founding Product Engineer ( | hide)
10. WordPress.org bans WP Engine (460 points | 395 comments)
11. Sony, Ubisoft scandals lead to California ban on deceptive digital goods sales (152 points | 37 comments)
12. Why are my ZFS disks so noisy? (78 points | 15 comments)

14. FCC unlocks spectrum to support advanced satellite services (107 points | 55 comments)

25. Smart TVs take snapshots of what you watch multiple times per second (15 points | 3 comments)

27. Nardwuar on his best and worst interviews (90 points | 26 comments)
28. Why the U.S. can't build icebreaking ships (192 points | 235 comments)
29. U.S. court orders LibGen to pay $30M to publishers, issues broad injunction (332 points | 316 comments)
30. If you're so smart, why aren't you rich? (2018) (7 points | 1 comment)
